snippet: SHORE--Martin H.,Age 90, of Palm Beach Gardens, FL passed away May 19, 2016. Loving husband to Lee, devoted father to Cathy Sirotin and Gregg Shore, proud grandfather to Maxwell and Nell. Funeral services at Wellwood Cemetery, West Babylon, NY on Sunday, May 22 at 1pm. Shiva visitation will take place at the Sirotin home, Sunday through Thursday evening May 26. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SHORE--Martin H.,Age 90, of Palm Beach Gardens, FL passed away May 19, 2016. Loving husband to Lee, devoted father to Cathy Sirotin and Gregg Shore, proud grandfather to Maxwell and Nell. Funeral services at Wellwood Cemetery, West Babylon, NY on Sunday, May 22 at 1pm. Shiva visitation will take place at the Sirotin home, Sunday through Thursday evening May 26. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SHORE, MARTIN H.
